name: Ice Cream Cupcake Maker
description:
Ice Cream Cupcakes, Lets get to baking!

Features:
- Many cupcake shapes to choose from: regular, heart, triangle, star
- Cupcake Liners, Lots and Lots
- Flavors
- Mix ingredients
- Decorations: Creams, frosting, candies, sprinkles
- EAT IT! EAT IT AGAIN AND AGAIN!
- and More!!!!!

Download Awesome Ice Cream Cupcake Maker - baking games right now and have fun making and mixing!

PLEASE NOTE:
- Awesome Ice Cream Cupcake Maker is free to play but in app purchases charges real money within the app. You can adjust your device settings to deactivate in app purchasing.
